 2013-01822013-02-28,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectMonique Le Rouzès ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Marc Beaudoin **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MONIQUE LE ROUZÈS, widow of the Hon. Marc Beaudoin, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, effective December 16, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
